entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
